film.filmname: Once Upon a Time in America
Once Upon a Time in the West

film.quote: The mankind is falling. Most decadent movie I've ever seen. Seems inspired by Bergman, Bunuel and Jodorovsky at the same time. A must-see one
One of the weirdest, original and "free" movies I've seen.
Best Polish movie in last 10 years. If you want to see what Poland looks like, see this one, and then add all the evil people carefully omitted by the director. Sad but optimistic :)
One of the best comedies, still funny after 1/2 century.

film.filmname: Monty Python and the Holy Grail

film.quote: "To drink, k****, or not to drink"

film.filmname: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb

film.quote: Not quite as Cronenbergish as one could hope but still very intriguing and well-played. Big for Mortensen. After LOTR I though this guy really can't play. Well he proved can, a big one.
Without Jack Nicholson this movie would be just okay.

film.filmname: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
I Served the King of England

film.quote: One of the best movies about a rock band if not the very best.

film.filmname: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

film.quote: Ridley Scott at his average. Washington just can't play a bad guy. Overall entertaining, well done but nothing special.

film.filmname: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

film.quote: The screenplay is so absurd and dumb that it's just awesome :)

film.filmname: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest

film.quote: Technically a pretty good movie. I wish the director knew anything about the subject though... Like many other recent movies from Germany - it was simplistic and left me in a "the director is making fool of me" state.
Great idea for a movie, pretty well organized for the first 50% and totally screwed up ending. This movie watches as if the producer cut off funding when it was half done. Not recommended.

film.filmname: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou

film.quote: Really, I have no idea why Gilliam made this movie. But I have some ideas why no one wanted to show it in theaters...
A very very poor remake. Avoid this director from now on. You have been warned.
